review: When it connects, it is great! It has an easy to navigate menu system, good app selection, however, getting and maintaining that WiFi connection is a bit of an issue. Using a wireless repeater in the same room as the TV and FireTV Stick, the device reports only a "good" signal where other devices have excellent signal. I have only installed 1 game, and after every play session the FireTV Stick looses connectivity and has to be rebooted. If the TV is off for over 12 hours, there are difficulties getting it to reconnect to WiFi. Streaming video is great quality, really shows the benefit of having the additional memory and faster processor from my older media center, which is seriously being reconsidered due to the connectivity issues
